message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase [Product Name] for a price of $1000000. This product is incredibly valuable to me, but I believe it has the potential to be even more valuable to you.  I'm confident you'll see the immense potential it holds. If you're not interested, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $800000, but I truly believe this product could be a game-changer for you.  Let me know what you think!
